alfred2.name: Alfred
alfred2.title: Joyous Snowdrop
alfred2.description: First prince of Firene. He works hard at training in the snow. Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: I was often sick when I was young, especially during this season. But now, I'm the epitome of health!
This festival is a beautiful sight. Back in Firene, we mainly celebrate the springtime. But why not winter, too?!
Huh... I heard you sneeze. Are you feeling OK? Be sure to dress warmly so you can stay healthy.
I'm just basking in the joys of winter. Beautiful flames lighting up the night sky, warm drinks amidst the snow...
I've got muscle balms, brawny cookies—No, no... These aren't for training. They're gifts for the kids!
Visit: Hey there! Won't you accept this gift? I ran all the way through the snow from [F]'s castle.
Level: Hahaha! This is nice. Was it all my training in the snow that did it?
To me, this achievement is the greatest gift of the winter festival.
Does anyone else feel chilly? I need to warm up somehow.
Summon: Hoo! Is this the festival venue?! I'm Alfred, crown prince of Firene... I ran through the snowy fields to get here!
Learn Skill: I'm delighted to receive a winter festival gift from you. Thank you.
Confession:
Are you patrolling here? I was just thinking of delivering a gift to the Divine Dragon.
You know, this isn't the first time I've brought a gift to the Divine Dragon's bedside.
When I visited Lythos as a child, I made an offering of wildflowers while the Divine Dragon slept.
When I think back on it though, it may have been a bit disrespectful to approach such a divine entity.
But now I feel blessed that we've become friends.
The Divine Dragon doesn't sleep as deeply now, so... I must be light on my feet.
You should sleep, too. When you wake up, you might find a gift for your muscles beside your pillow!
Status: Hoo! Nothing beats going for a run in the snow. It's good training!
Oh! Do I have some snow on me? *chuckle* I was just running outside.
It's great to exercise your muscles in the cold. Not only does it make you healthy, but it warms you up too!
Leave the heavy gifts to me! I'll make carrying them a part of my training.
Snowflakes are much like flowers. Ah, they're so beautiful, it's such a shame when they melt...
You receive presents if you're good, huh? Well, I've only ever wanted one thing since I was a child...
You'll never guess the gifts I've gathered... They're good for your muscles... Oh, I'm sure you can't wait any longer. For you, I've got a special turkey-flavored supplement!

gatekeeper2.name: Gatekeeper
gatekeeper2.title: Midwinter Toil
gatekeeper2.description: The guard who watches over the gates of Garreg Mach Monastery. He gives it his all after being chosen as a winter-festival envoy. Appears in Fire Emblem: Three Houses.

Castle Hall: I made a promise to deliver gifts to all the good little Heroes!
My parents are from the Adrestian Empire. I sure hope they can enjoy the winter festivities this year.
Don't worry, I'll conceal my horn today. Besides, all this work would be for nothing if I woke everyone up.
I wonder if the Hresvelgion whisker, Riegan tabby, or Blaiddyd rex will pitch in with this year's festival.
What do you think of my attire? It's not my usual, but I guess it's more suitable for the winter festival.
Visit: Please, accept this winter gift. I've come to you as gatekeeper of [F]'s castle.
Level: At ease, Summoner! Nothing to report at the winter festival!
I am living up to my duty as winter envoy!
Huh? I haven't grown at all! What a shame, to be bested by the cold...
Summon: The winter festival season is here, and I've been given the role of winter envoy. I'll do my best to live up to it!
Learn Skill: You also have a gift for me?! You know just how to motivate me! Thank you.
Confession:
I'm fully devoted to my job of preventing intruders. No one suspicious gets past me!
Yet, for this winter festival, I'm the one sneaking into people's houses...
Well, not so much sneaking. More like delivering dreams!
That's actually something I've wanted to do for a long time—deliver dreams to someone, like Heroes do...
Hah... Thank you for allowing me to take on the role of winter envoy this season, [S].
And tomorrow, when this is all over, I'll be gatekeeper again.
I will continue to fulfill my duties with these memories tucked away in my heart forever!
Status: I'll carry out my duties as winter envoy to the best of my ability!
Hey, now! You might make me drop the presents!
Of course, I'd be happy to receive a box of fishing supplies.
Nothing to report! Even at the winter festival, I won't let my guard down.
Hmm... It is a challenge telling suspicious people apart from those in winter costumes...
Funny. I'm used to keeping people out, and now here I am sneaking into strangers' houses...
I'll accept the responsibility of delivering your gift!

ivy3.name: Ivy
ivy3.title: Flurry Embrace
ivy3.description: The first princesses of Elusia and Nohr. They get along splendidly and are here to enjoy the winter festival to its fullest. They appear in Fire Emblem Engage / Fates.
ivy3.harmonized:
Grants【Resonance: Blades】and 【Resonance: Shields】to unit and allies from the same titles as unit.
Applies【Divine Vein (Haze)】on closest foes' spaces and on each space within 2 spaces of those spaces for 2 turns.
(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the Harmonized button. This skill can only be used once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be used by units deployed using
Pair Up
.)
(When unit has a status or a skill that enables use of a
Style
, Duo Skills and Harmonized Skills cannot be used while unit can take an action (those skills can be used after unit has acted).)
【Resonance: Blades】
Grants Atk/Spd+4 during combat for 1 turn.
【Resonance: Shields】
Grants Def/Res+4 during combat and the following effect for 1 turn: "During unit's first combat in player phase or enemy phase, foe cannot make a follow-up attack."
【Divine Vein (Haze)】
Applies the following effects on space: Inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe and neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat. (Divine Vein effects do not stack; replaces any existing Divine Vein effect; Divine Vein effects applied simultaneously cancel each other out.)

Castle Hall: **Ivy:** Choosing gifts is fun. This is for the Divine Dragon. That's for Hortensia. And this...is for my late father.
**Camilla:** It seems traditional to deliver winter- festival gifts on a sleigh... In our case, wyverns might be more appropriate.
**Ivy:** Camilla's outfit reminds me of the Vervain deer near my hometown, though they never got this close...
**Camilla:** The kingdoms of Nohr and Elusia are frigid lands. Those of us familiar with that cold know how to keep warm.
**Ivy:** Oh. A winter-festival feast has been prepared. Camilla, what do you like? Hmm? Lightly roasted beef?
Visit: **Ivy:** Did I wake you? I was trying not to disturb your sleep while I delivered gifts from [F].
Level: **Ivy:** What a nice winter festival this has been. I almost felt like a child again.
**Camilla:** How lovely. This is thanks to you, Ivy. Would you show me that strong pose of yours again?
**Ivy:** I should be used to dealing with the cold, but...I may have just gotten a bit too excited.
Summon: I'm Ivy, crown princess of Elusia. I am here enjoying the winter festival with Camilla, the eldest princess of Nohr.
Learn Skill: **Ivy:** Is this a winter-festival gift? It's so delightful to be given something in person like this.
Confession:
**Ivy:** That's it for handing out gifts tonight. The snow has picked up, but you seem to be handling it fine, Camilla.
**Camilla:** So far. If this were enemy territory, we could set it on fire to warm things up... Sorry, was that too aggressive?
**Ivy:** No, it made me nostalgic. I recall you had a technique called Dark Inferno as an Emblem. It was quite useful.
**Camilla:** Haha! You have a ruthless streak too. I can't use that technique, but I might have other ways to keep you warm.
**Ivy:** You're getting pretty close, Camilla. Are you going to give me another of your hugs? Wait. Is this...a scarf?
**Camilla:** It's a winter-festival gift. I knitted it with you in mind. I'd be delighted if you accepted it.
**Ivy:** Thank you! I will treasure it always. Now that our deliveries are done, I have a gift I set aside for you too.
Status: "Let us celebrate together, Camilla. Um... You are very close." "It's chilly out! We should share our warmth, Princess Ivy."
Conversation: **Ivy:** Camilla. I am pleased I can celebrate the winter festival with you. Seeing you again... It's like a dream.
**Camilla:** I understand I was an Emblem in Elyos. Knowing Corrin was there too makes me very happy.
**Ivy:** Yes, though you resided in a bracelet, while Corrin resided in a ring. You were so much help to me there.
**Camilla:** Knowing another me was so close to you but it wasn't me makes me just a little jealous.
But right now, I'm closest to you. So, why don't we take this time to learn more about each other?
**Ivy:** Yes. Tell me then. That child, Elise, who was handing out gifts before— she is your younger sister, correct?
I have noticed Hortensia looks up to and adores her. Our younger sisters appear to have grown quite close.
**Camilla:** Hortensia... Ah! That adorable girl! She really does resemble you.
**Ivy:** She resembles me? I've never been told that before. Hortensia and I have different mothers, so...
**Camilla:** As it is for me and Elise. Being alike and forming strong bonds is more than shared blood and appearances.
**Ivy:** Thank you, Camilla. We seem to have a lot in common, like both of us being the eldest princess.
**Camilla:** We should spend more time together at this winter festival. Oh, look, it's started snowing.
**Ivy:** It's getting quite cold... Perhaps we could find a hot spring in which to relax and continue our conversation?
**Camilla:** Huh? Oh. Y-yes, let's! I'm grateful for your offer, but I'm surprised you were the first to suggest it.
**Ivy:** I once made a promise...to Emblem Camilla. Ultimately, we could never enjoy a hot spring together.
It was not possible at the time, but I thought perhaps it would happen one day. And now, it can.
**Camilla:** Yes, it can. I will help you fulfill your promise. Let us get to know each other better someplace warm, then.

seidr3.name: Seiðr
seidr3.title: Candlelit Hope
seidr3.description: Goddess of Vanaheimr, the realm of light. She descends from the heavens to light people's hearts with hope as a winter-festival envoy.

Castle Hall: The joy of mortals is a heartfelt gift... I will put all my heart into my duty as an envoy of the winter festival.
Vanaheimr is the realm of light. The gorgeous light illuminating the winter festival feels similarly warm to me.
Do you want a gift too? You needn't worry, I have something prepared for you, [S].
If I were to give a gift to Heiðr... Yes, a cozy mantle might be just right.
This is official winter-festival-envoy attire? It feels unseasonably light, but I'm sure it holds great significance.
Visit: I have delivered the gifts. Um...would you happen to know the way back to [F]'s?
Level: Light and hope to mortals. That is the wish of the goddess of Vanaheimr.
The gifts are all delivered. I have fulfilled my duty as an envoy.
Oh... N-no, of course I didn't lose my way. I'm just taking some extra time.
Summon: I am Seiðr, goddess of Vanaheimr, the realm of light. Let us give hope for the future at Askr's winter festival.
Learn Skill: Your sincerity is clear. This will truly be a wonderful winter's night.
Confession:
Bringing light into the lives of mortals is a goddess of Vanaheimr's mission. Light means hope.
Therefore, a winter-festival envoy is fulfilling a similar role by bringing hope and joy to people.
Given that, it is only natural that I would serve as an envoy. I consider it a role well-suited to me.
I want to deliver as many gifts as possible so that people can have a morning of hope. That is my wish.
Oh, and I'd like to go visit that big decorated tree before the new day begins too.
Would you consider accompanying me on this holy night? Not that I am lost or anything...
Status: As I am a goddess, I shall bestow gifts upon the children of Midgard.
*startle* You are up to this again, I see...
The decorations in town are so pretty. I imagine Heiðr would be delighted to see them.
*sigh* This festival is like a shining light in the cold, dark winter.
I am here to deliver presents. Oh, but... Where am I?
What do I want? Well, I...
Tell me what it is you want and if I can grant it, I will.

zelkov.name: Zelkov
zelkov.title: Winter Shadow
zelkov.description: A royal knight from Elusia and Ivy's retainer. He *looks forward* to delivering presents to the *children.* Appears in Fire Emblem Engage.

Castle Hall: I'll admit I am more *merry* than usual. It's not every day one has the opportunity to give gifts to *children.*
When I was young, I spent a winter festival with my family... It was so long ago, it's but a *dim memory.*
Leaving a gift for someone who's sleeping requires stealth... Why would one wear such *conspicuous* attire?
Dolls, stuffed animals, and ornaments aren't *cute.* What's cute are the smiles of children who receive them.
I am making *candles* for the winter festival. It is quite fun to *experiment* in making them even more gorgeous...
Visit: I have brought *winter-festival* gifts for the children of the castle. They are from [F].
Level: I believe I have achieved a *result* worthy of a winter envoy.
I will deliver more gifts, and in a *reliable* fashion as well.
I cannot let the children see my *disappointed face...*
Summon:
I'm Zelkov, a soldier from the royal castle of Elusia. I am working at the winter festival this year.
Can you point me toward the *good* children?
Learn Skill: I did not believe I would be on the *receiving* end of a gift. I am grateful.
Confession:
Tonight's delivery is complete. I am happy to take on *extra work.* It is not as though I sleep much anyway.
I would rather stay awake to work a *dream* job than fall asleep to have a nightmare.
One of my reasons, of course, is for the children. But another is my own feeling of *mourning...*
My twin brother died when we were young, so to me he will always be a *child.*
But if I keep handing out gifts, a bit of the children's happiness, and my own, might somehow reach my brother.
I feel I have overshared. The point is, I have my *reasons.* Now, if I may ask you for some *extra* gifts...
Status: I believe my candle-making *hobby* will be useful here.
Ahh! Oh...it is you. I thought it might be one of the *children.*
I do not intend to deliver presents to *adult* Heroes. I expect you can retrieve them yourselves.
There is no need to be *suspicious* of me. If a child is frightened of me, I will reassure them of this.
I am fond of snow, particularly at night. It makes for *convenient* covert operations.
I have a *gift* for Princess Ivy...and I suppose for Kagetsu as well...
There, there, children. Come, let me give you *presents.* What would you like? Some *candy* perhaps?
